code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(_ref){let{onJoin}=_ref;const[nickname,setNickname]=useState('');const[isAdult,setIsAdult]=useState(false);const handleStart=()=>{if(!nickname.trim())return alert('Please enter a nickname');if(!isAdult)return alert('You must confirm you are 18+');onJoin(nickname.trim());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{height:'100vh',background:'linear-gradient(to right, #0f2027, #203a43, #2c5364)',display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',alignItems:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{background:'#1f1f1f',padding:'40px',borderRadius:'10px',boxShadow:'0 0 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.6)',textAlign:'center',width:'90%',maxWidth:'400px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{marginBottom:'20px'},children:"Stranger Chat"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter your nickname",value:nickname,onChange:e=>setNickname(e.target.value),style:{width:'100%',padding:'10px',marginBottom:'10px',borderRadius:'5px',border:'none'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:'15px',display:'flex',alignItems:'center',justifyContent:'center',gap:'10px',color:'#ccc',fontSize:'14px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:isAdult,onChange:()=>setIsAdult(!isAdult)}),"I confirm I'm 18+ years old"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleStart,style:{width:'100%',backgroundColor:'#00ffe1',color:'#000',padding:'10px',borderRadius:'5px',border:'none',fontWeight:'bold',cursor:'pointer'},children:"Start Chatting"})]})});}export default Home;
